embedInfo.title: WhatsappBuddy Information
embedInfo.description: This bot bridges WhatsApp and Discord. It creates a channel in Discord for each WhatsApp chat and relays messages between the two platforms.

fields.name: Feature 1
fields.value: Relays messages from WhatsApp to Discord and vice versa.

fields.name: Feature 2
fields.value: Creates a new channel for each WhatsApp chat based on the chat ID.

fields.name: Feature 3
fields.value: Displays messages sent by you differently for clarity.
